alert.note: Alert for Eastern Loudoun; Western Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 1:40AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT CENTRAL LOUDOUN COUNTY... At 138 AM EST, an area of heavy snow was located near Purcellville, moving southeast at 10 mph. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Broadlands, Lansdowne, Brambleton, Ashburn, Purcellville, Round Hill, Oatlands, Belmont, Hamilton, Hillsboro, Paeonian Springs, Gleedsville, Lincoln, and Hughesville. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile, and a quick coating of snow may result in slipper travel conditions. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
